resources.string: The overlay permission is required in order to show Klick\'r interface over the applications you want to automate, allowing you to configure your scenario without stopping the other application.

The accessibility service permission allows Klick'r to perform gestures on your device screen. This permission is required in order to execute the clicks and swipes you will create in your automations scenarios.

No data is collected by Klick'r

To grant the Accessibility service permission, click on the button bellow.
Optional: Shows the notification while the application is running in order to easily return to the scenario selection screen.
This permission is mandatory for Klick\'r. It won\'t be able to work correctly without it.
